competitors.name: Salesforce

context: In 2015, Veeva was public (IPO'd 2013) and establishing dominance in pharmaceutical CRM built on Salesforce platform. IMS Health was the major data competitor before its 2016 merger with Quintiles to form QuintilesIMS (later IQVIA). Veeva launched Vault platform expanding beyond CRM into content management, clinical, regulatory, and quality. The life sciences cloud software market was growing rapidly as pharma companies digitized operations.
